column4: hi, anybody know how to install a ubuntu from windows, as my bios is cooked, and i can't boot fro cd, anyone?
Have you checked your BIOS settings?
Phazor: as soon as i go to advanced features, my bios freezes
Have you tried flashing your BIOS and installing a newly downloaded one?
Phazor: i to much of a nube for that, any tuto's you could recomend?
What type of motherboard have you got?
Phazor: how can i see what mother board i have, do have to open it up? i ve got a crappy windows on it, but need to get rid asap, i tried downloading colinux, but to no avail
Phazor: how can i see what mother board i have, do have to open it up? i ve got a crappy windows on it, but need to get rid asap, i tried downloading colinux, but to no avail
Try downloading either AIDA32 from http://www.majorgeeks.com/download.html or SIW from http://www3.sympactico.ca/gtopala/siw_download.html
Phazor: are you sure about those links?
Pretty sure, why?
one does not work, and the other is weird, about small buisness etc?
Okay, let me have another look
or am i being dumb?
ardchiolle: i really must be, cos i don't understand that too...
Go to http://www.majorgeeks.com/download181.html and click on the MajorGeeks EU link. You should then start to download a ZIP file.
is this for flashing the Motherboard?
No, just for determining which motherboard you have
Actually, it looks like I have found a better guide than me about flashing the BIOS, look at http://www.pcnineoneone.com/howto/biosflash1.html
I have to go now anyway. Sorry
Thanks for the help
